reviewText: We got this DVD when our son was about 18 months old. He never paid attention to the tv before, but loved this. I loved the music so I didn't mind playing it over and over again. I think this is the perfect video for little ones 9mon - 2yrs. Its visually stimulating, great songs, stuff like baby laughs, dogs and balls that really get baby's attention.
Title: N/A

reviewText: We received the 'Curious Buddies, Exploring at the Beach' DVD as a gift, and my 13 month old daughter loved it (and so did I). So I came searching for more of the Curious Buddies, and found this one, and purchased it. It didn't disappoint! It's adorable, and my now 14 month old definitely loves it. She won't take her eyes off the cute little puppets, the dog seems to be her favorite! These are well put together videos, I'm impressed. I hope more of these come out!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: All of the Curious Buddies products are great.  They keep my baby interested with the music, we even dance together to them.
Title: N/A

reviewText: These DVD's are amazing. Both of my daughter's love them (4 and 2) and will watch them over and over again if i let them. I own all of the Curious Buddies DVD's except for the Let's Make Music one, only because I have not been able to find it anywhere. They teach babies and toddlers a variety of different things and have cute songs that they love as well. I only wish they were longer then 30 minutes. But they do have a repeat play option right from them DVD menu.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Curious Buddies are very nice, calm vidios for toddlers. My grand daughter just loves them and this one did not disappoint.
